thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
I bought ladders from Trade Tested which were faulty and therefore dangerous. The staff were initially helpful on the phone. I posted ladders recorded delivery but have since mislade the number.
Called TT twice and was told on both occasions they would look for my ladders and get back to me which they never did. I've now gave up.
In my opinion, based on my experience, their after sales customer service is rubbish and they lied to me, yes lied. I would rather take my chances and buy online from China than deal with these chancers.
To any potential customers please read the negative comments they mostly have one thing in common. TT don't like honouring warranties should your goods be faulty.
